ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Re: A Name for "3 out of 4 REST constraints" APIs?
ygData.msgSnippet: REST-minus or URI-oriented I would not consider anything an abuse of REST unless they are making false claims to be REST-full.

or

I would not consider anything an abuse of REST unless they are making
